description: Peter Florjancic, who has died aged 101, was an Olympian, prolific inventor and friend of the famous.
title: Peter Florjancic: Story of ski-jumping inventor who escaped the Nazis
title_page: Peter Florjancic: Story of ski-jumping inventor who escaped the Nazis - BBC News
maintext: There were signs of the ingenuity that would mark his later career as an inventor, too. He recalled creating an early sweatband aged just six. "We [would] roll around in the mud and grass. My whole face was dirty," he said. "So I cut a sock, put it on my hand and wiped my face with it and my face was clean again."
